alert.note: Alert for Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:58PM EDT until May 16 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MORGAN...NORTH CENTRAL BREATHITT AND WOLFE COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stillwater, or over Campton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Trent around 400 PM EDT. Landsaw around 405 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gilmore, Lee City and Belknap. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
